name: Volkyri
description: The Volkyri aesthetic - ancient starfaring warrior-attendants from the Hel Vortex system. Features mandatory single asymmetrical half-horn (from LEFT or RIGHT temple only, never centered), metallic bodysuits, two-color maximum palette, martial bearing, and dramatic lighting. 'Elegance is lethality refined.'
